desc: Airplanes and Coffee is a nonprofit organization for the purpose of promoting and preserving General Aviation. We organize Fly-ins on the first Saturday of every month. Our mission is to inspire the next generation of aviators.

layout.text:
Our August Fly-in will be on 8-6-2022 at TX Aero Sport, X65. In Howe, TX. We are headed for the grass everyone.
There will be Acrobatic Box with a 10 minute show. The airport will close around 11:30am. If you are flying around that time check with the Air Boss on 122.9. The airport will re-open as soon as the show plane is recovered.
